original: MÖRNER, Karl Gustav Stellan, Greve, Civilingenjör, Stockholm, f Sthlm 22/5 92 av prof greve K A H M af Morlanda o Fanny Ekengren, gm Elsa Bolinder. Studex Sthlm 11, KTH 11—15. Ing v STAL i Finspång 15— 16 v J & C G Bolinders Mek Verkst AB i Sthlm 16—18, ing o avd.chef v SKF i Gbg 18—20, åter ss avd.chef v J & C G Bolinders Mek Verkst 20—24, vkst dir o styr.led i Verkst AB Herkules i Gbg fr 25 samt f J & C G Bolinders Mek Verkst AB (senare Bolinders Förvaltn AB) fr 32 o f Bolinders Fabrik» AB i Sthlm fr 33. Styr.led i Hesselman Motor Corp AB 41, Motor AB Trim samt Fastigh AB Klara Sjö. Resor o studier i USA 24—25, resor i Europa 25—39. Led Sv Tekn.frn. RVO.
translated: MÖRNER, Karl Gustav Stellan, Count, Civil Engineer, Stockholm, born in Stockholm on May 22, 1892, son of Professor Count K.A.H.M. af Morlanda and Fanny Ekengren, married Elsa Bolinder. Graduated from Stockholm 11, Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) 11-15. Worked as an engineer at STAL in Finspång 15-16 and J&C G Bolinders Mechanical Works AB in Stockholm 16-18. Was an engineer and department head at SKF in Gothenburg 18-20, then returned as a department head at J&C G Bolinders Mechanical Works 20-24. Became a director and board member at Herkules Engineering AB in Gothenburg from 25, and also at J&C G Bolinders Mechanical Works AB (later Bolinders Förvaltn AB) from 32, and at Bolinders Fabrik AB in Stockholm from 33. Served on the board of Hesselman Motor Corp AB in 41, Motor AB Trim, and Real Estate AB Klara Sjö. Traveled and studied in the USA 24-25, and traveled in Europe 25-39. Member of the Swedish Institute of Technology. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa.

memberOf.name: J & C G Bolinders Mek Verkst AB
J & C G Bolinders Mek Verkst

structured.description: Count Karl Gustav Stellan Mörner was a Swedish Civil Engineer born in Stockholm on May 22, 1892. He was the son of Professor Count K.A.H.M. af Morlanda and Fanny Ekengren. Karl married Elsa Bolinder. He graduated from Studex Sthlm 11 and Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) 11-15. Karl worked at various organizations including STAL, J & C G Bolinders Mek Verkst AB, SKF, and Verkst AB Herkules. He held positions such as Engineer, Department Head, Director, and Board Member. Karl was also involved in Hesselman Motor Corp AB, Motor AB Trim, and Real Estate AB Klara Sjö, serving on their boards. He traveled and studied in the USA and Europe. Karl was a member of the Swedish Institute of Technology and received the Royal Order of Vasa.

career.workplace: J&C G Bolinders Mechanical Works AB
J&C G Bolinders Mechanical Works AB
J&C G Bolinders Mechanical Works AB (later Bolinders Förvaltn AB)
